name: assaascl1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cur, c1)), cfv(cur, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cur, c1)), cfv(cur, c2)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cascl, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, clmod))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crg))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 `(1r ` c1))=(1r ` c2))
⊣ c0 =(algSc ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Ring)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cur, c1)), cfv(cur, c2)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cascl, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, clmod))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crg))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 `(1r ` c1))=(1r ` c2))
⊣ c0 =(algSc ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Ring)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c2, clmod))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, casa))
-| wi(wcel(c2, casa), wcel(c2, clmod))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c2 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ AssAlg)
⊣ (c2 ∈ AssAlg → c2 ∈ LMod)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cur, c1)), cfv(cur, c2)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cascl, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crg))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, casa))
-| wi(wcel(c2, casa), wcel(c2, clmod))

⊢ (w0 →(c0 `(1r ` c1))=(1r ` c2))
⊣ c0 =(algSc ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Scalar ` c2)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Ring)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ AssAlg)

comment: The scalar 1 embedded into an associative algebra corresponds to the 1 of the an associative algebra. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jul-2019.)
